text: Always submit the pull requests to master -- storm-enroute-bot deploys snapshots from it automatically.
description: You should always merge or submit pull requests to the `master` branch. Once a project builds successfully and passes reviews, the EVE bot will perform tests and deploy a snapshot. This way the `master` branch almost always builds correctly and other projects can depend on it.

text: Create topic/XXX branches to implement new features.
description: Once you are done working on the new feature in your `topic/XXX` branch you can merge it into the `master` branch. From there on it will be tested and merged further by the bot automatically.

text: Separate your pull requests into minimal, standalone, functional changesets.
description: This makes it easier and faster to review the PRs. Large are likely to take long to review and merge.
